channel.title: Client Help
channel.description:
"Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefError: EGUI"
This is on Galk. Pride Client V3
My friend needs help. I have tried everything. He has the newest Java....don't ask.......

item.title: Client Help
item.dc:creator: @ry60003333 ry60003333
item.description:
@ry60003333 wrote:

Got it. I’ve been around the other forums also. And I’d have to agree some of the people there are a little less noobish

Read full topic

item.title: Client Help
item.dc:creator: @Call_of_Duty Call of Duty
item.description:
@Call_of_Duty wrote:

I’m not a MoparScaper, I’m a MoparScapian, cooler person. Yeah, I understand, I thought you were just flaming him etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Client Help
item.dc:creator: @ry60003333 ry60003333
item.description:
@ry60003333 wrote:

Call of Duty:

Lol, don’t make assumptions because you’ve heard of www.google.com ? You are an ignorant idiot for flaming him right away and making assumptions you stupid hypocrite, or MoparScaper. I’ll admit I just posted and hoped, but at least I didn’t come back saying “Oh, you’re stupid, go here ‘java.sun.com…’.”.

No, I wasn’t flaming him at all. I thought that this was for servers only, not client questions also. Plus, your the one who is flaming now. And, why in the world are you on MoparScape if you hate it so much, you MoparScaper. Plus, that makes you a hypocrite. And I just wanted to help him, because knowing what the exception is kind of helps. I hope you understand, and I have no idea where you got the idea to use google!

Read full topic

item.title: Client Help
item.dc:creator: @Call_of_Duty Call of Duty
item.description:
@Call_of_Duty wrote:

[quote=“ry60003333, post:6, topic:196051”][quote author=TeleNubby link=topic=260606.msg2160926#msg2160926 date=1207375171]

-Cough-RS2 Server Development/Help-Cough-
[/quote]Ry, no questions are allowed in client hacking, and client questions are for MoparScape-related ones only. So, leaving only one option, its here. I’ve talked to a few moderators, they all agree. But we’re trying to change it up a bit, too. Eventually…

Got it. And changing it up would help a bit.

[quote author=Call of Duty link=topic=260606.msg2160929#msg2160929 date=1207375274]

-Cough-RS2 Server Development/Help-Cough-
[/quote]Ignorant MoparScaper, you post client questions in here too, read all the locked topics in the Client Hacking section. For running your client, try putting this in:

@echo off title Galkon's Pride Client V3 JAVA -Xmx300m EGUI pause

Do not make assumptions about others. Also, the method you posted won’t work. http://java.sun.com/j2se/1.4.2/docs/api/java/lang/NoClassDefFoundError.html
Seems someone doesn’t know what no class found means. (The class could not be found :rolleyes:)[/quote]Lol, don’t make assumptions because you’ve heard of www.google.com ? You are an ignorant idiot for flaming him right away and making assumptions you stupid hypocrite, or MoparScaper. I’ll admit I just posted and hoped, but at least I didn’t come back saying “Oh, you’re stupid, go here ‘java.sun.com…’.”.

Read full topic

item.title: Client Help
item.dc:creator: @ry60003333 ry60003333
item.description:
@ry60003333 wrote:

[quote=“TeleNubby, post:3, topic:196051”][quote author=ry60003333 link=topic=260606.msg2160921#msg2160921 date=1207374986]
-Cough-RS2 Server Development/Help-Cough-
[/quote]Ry, no questions are allowed in client hacking, and client questions are for MoparScape-related ones only. So, leaving only one option, its here. I’ve talked to a few moderators, they all agree. But we’re trying to change it up a bit, too. Eventually…[/quote]
Got it. And changing it up would help a bit.

[quote=“Call of Duty, post:4, topic:196051”][quote author=ry60003333 link=topic=260606.msg2160921#msg2160921 date=1207374986]
-Cough-RS2 Server Development/Help-Cough-
[/quote]Ignorant MoparScaper, you post client questions in here too, read all the locked topics in the Client Hacking section. For running your client, try putting this in:

@echo off title Galkon's Pride Client V3 JAVA -Xmx300m EGUI pause[/quote]
Do not make assumptions about others. Also, the method you posted won’t work. http://java.sun.com/j2se/1.4.2/docs/api/java/lang/NoClassDefFoundError.html
Seems someone doesn’t know what no class found means. (The class could not be found :rolleyes:)

Read full topic
